verbs.description: By [V: imposing] [ARG1: tariffs on Canadian products] , blowing up the G7 summit , and then insulting Justin Trudeau , [ARG0: Donald Trump] has aroused intense patriotic sentiment in Canada , and helped the Canadian prime minister secure widespread support .
